snippet: As Jazz at Lincoln Center celebrates its 25th anniversary, its artistic director, Wynton Marsalis, has consolidated his influence and charted new directions.
abstract: Wynton Marsalis, who became artistic director of Jazz at Lincoln Center in Spring 2012, has managed to shake up institution's management, consolidate his influence and chart new directions as center celebrates its 25th anniversary.
lead_paragraph: As Jazz at Lincoln Center celebrates its 25th anniversary, its artistic director, Wynton Marsalis, has consolidated his influence and charted new directions.

headline.seo: Wynton Marsalis Holds Reins at Jazz at Lincoln Center
headline.main: Just One Bishop at High Church of Jazz Purity
headline.print_headline: Just One Bishop At High Church Of Jazz Purity
